Bebop.me 💑

A quick visual novel game made for my web and mobile development class using the Ren’Py Visual Novel Engine.

Thursday - April 30, 2015

1 minute read ∙ 96 words

0 Comments

Overview

Bebop.me is a romantic visual novel set in high school.

This project was completed in April 2015 for CSC 395 - Web and Mobile App Development in collaboration with New Era Productions.

Disclaimer: I did not come up with the story. New Era Productions did.

Screenshots

TODO: [gallery type=“rectangular” size=“full” ids=“3341,3340,3338,3337,3335,3358,3359” ]

Tools

  • Google App Engine with Python runtime
  • Spectral by HTML5UP
  • Ren’Py Visual Novel Engine

Links

  • Google App Engine | Web App at bebop-me.appspot.com
  • Mac | Desktop App
  • Windows | Desktop App
  • iOS | Mobile App (Files Only)
  • Presentation | Speaker Deck
  • GitHub Repo
